name: Alan Wake: The Signal Remastered
storyline: Continuing on where the main game finished, Alan finds himself outside the diner in a nighttime Bright Falls, which quickly changes to daytime. Entering the diner, a surreal déjà-vu dream of the events plays out similar to when Alan first arrived, with everything eerily familiar but out of place. Alan cannot remember where he was before this moment but knows he must go to the back of the diner, which he forcibly enters. Zane talks to Alan and warns him that he should go no further and that Alan must focus. Zane plays a video of Alan struggling with reality and even tells of events playing out when Alan realises where he is: The Dark Place.
summary: The Signal Remastered is a single-player episode included with Alan Wake Remastered (2021). "The Signal" was originally an additional Alan Wake episode released via DLC in October 2010. The episode can be started whenever the player chooses to do so, but it is set immediately after the events of the base game. The second and final Alan Wake DLC episode, "The Writer," was also remastered and included with Alan Wake Remastered.
